items.sentence: I doubt Tom will ever forgive Mary for doing that.
I doubt that Tom will be punished for what he did.
I doubt that Tom would ever do that kind of thing.
I doubt very seriously that Tom will win the race.
I have a feeling that wasn\'t too difficult to do.
I haven\'t eaten anything for the last three days.
Can you please tell me how I can get to the beach?
It was wise of you to take your umbrella with you.
It would be counter-productive to do such a thing.
It would be great if you could join us for dinner.
Tom is in the next room, explaining what happened.
Tom is one of the guys that Mary is interested in.
I can\'t bear the thought of her with another man.
I can\'t figure out why nobody comes here anymore.
I can\'t say I share your enthusiasm for the idea.
I can\'t tell you how much I appreciate your help.
I can\'t turn it on, because the switch is broken.
It was obvious that Tom didn\'t want to kiss Mary.
I\'m the one who convinced Tom to stop doing that.
I\'m thinking that I should take French next year.
